meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Neil Brockman Carol Miller Doug Molitor Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #667.

td.p: Neil Brockman, a lawyer originally from Brooklyn, New York
Carol Miller, a sales manager from Herndon, Virginia
Doug Molitor, a writer from Brentwood, California (whose 2-day cash winnings total $19,901)

tr.td: START AT THE "TOP"
THE MIDDLE EAST
THE MIDWEST
(Alex: Hey, we're on a roll with...)
THE MIDDLE AGES
MIDDLE NAMES
BOTTOMS UP

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '[Doug\'s response is very sloppily written, so he read\'s it out loud. Alex is able to find an "L" and the "Assn." and counts him correct.]
CarolWhat is the March of Dimes?
$0
DougWhat is the Amer. Lung Assn.
$8,800
NeilWhat is UNICEF?
$8,500
American Lung Association')
